extension.summary: Seedr Repository Download Torrents to the seedr cloud Instantly access across all devices through Kodi, your phone, your PC :-) www.seedr.cc Account required
extension.disclaimer: This plugin and all it's content, unless otherwise specified, is property of Seedr.cc
extension.description: This repository contains the Seedr Torrent Cloud add-on for Kodi, allowing you to stream torrents from your Seedr.cc cloud storage.
